name: It's a Miracle!
description:
It’s a miracle! is a market sim where everybody is trading items, some of those items combine into more valuable items, and some of those valuable items combine into even more valuable items!

You are one of those villagers —a bearded man who can strangely turn water into wine— and you go around trying to make as many combinations as you can for the entire community to enjoy. At the end of the game, you get the final score —the value of everybody’s combinations— plus a bonus for each different combination!

Controls

Use W-A-S-D to move.

Left-click or right-click near a neighbor to trade your left or right item.

Think of the best combinations and spread the joy before the end of the day!
